parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Bastionhost instance to which the users to be queried belong.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the Bastionhost instance.

parameters.name: PublicKeyId
parameters.description:
The public key ID.

>  You can call the [ListUserPublicKeys](~~477555~~) operation to query the public key ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the bastion host. For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
